Package ch.pschatzmann.scad4j

Class SCAD

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.SCAD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class SCAD
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Factory methods for SCAD objects A detailed explanation of SCAD can be found at https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/OpenSCAD_User_Manual/The_OpenSCAD_Language#import
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
